original_title: Canelo Alvarez vs. Billy Joe Saunders
overview: Canelo Álvarez vs. Billy Joe Saunders, billed as Face the Fearless, is a super middleweight professional boxing match contested between WBA (Super), WBC, and The Ring champion, Canelo Álvarez, and WBO champion Billy Joe Saunders. The bout took take place on May 8, 2021, at the AT&T Stadium in Dallas, Texas.
title: Canelo Alvarez vs. Billy Joe Saunders
